## BasicTableColumn interface

Basic table column definition

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface BasicTableColumn<TData = any> extends GridColumn 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [bodyTemplate](./grid.basictablecolumn.bodytemplate.md) | <code>TemplateRef&lt;BasicTableColumnContext&lt;TData&gt;&gt;</code> | Template that is used for rendering of cell body |
|  [cellClass](./grid.basictablecolumn.cellclass.md) | <code>string</code> | Css class that is applied to each column cell |
|  [headerClass](./grid.basictablecolumn.headerclass.md) | <code>string</code> | Css class that is applied to column header |
|  [headerTemplate](./grid.basictablecolumn.headertemplate.md) | <code>TemplateRef&lt;BasicTableColumnContext&lt;TData&gt;&gt;</code> | Template that is used for rendering of cell header |
|  [headerTooltip](./grid.basictablecolumn.headertooltip.md) | <code>string</code> | Text that is displayed in tooltip over grid header |
|  [name](./grid.basictablecolumn.name.md) | <code>string</code> | Name of property which is assigned to this column |
|  [ordering](./grid.basictablecolumn.ordering.md) | <code>boolean</code> | Indication that this column can be used for ordering |
|  [titleVisible](./grid.basictablecolumn.titlevisible.md) | <code>boolean</code> | Indication whether should be title visible in header |
|  [width](./grid.basictablecolumn.width.md) | <code>string</code> | Width as style string, value is exactly same (require units) |

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [getColumnContext(data, column, index, startingIndex)](./grid.basictablecolumn.getcolumncontext.md) | Gets basic table column context |
